# Optimal biding  
$$ 
p( \text{user} | \text{journey state} ) \times p(\text{journey state})
$$

Note the journey states are 

- Awareness (impressions < k)  
- Interest ( click through > 0) => remarketing list interest 
- Consideration (search result page) => dynamic remarketing list consideration 
- Conversion (lead response page) => dynamic  
- Retention (remarketing cohorts - weeks one on the off for a week) also encod response emails. 
- Recommendation (social share) - goals to get shares of jobs.
